mapper.insert: insert into users (user_no, id, pw, name, gender, email, profile, phoneNum, postcode, address) values (users_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{email}, #{profile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phoneNum}, #{postcode}, #{address})
mapper.select: select * from users where id=#{id} and name=#{name]
select * from users where name=#{nickname} and email=#{email}
select count(*) from users where id =#{inputname}
mapper.update: update users set id = #{id}, pw = #{pw, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name=#{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, profile = #{profile, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phoneNum = #{phoneNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, postcode = #{postcode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where user_no = #{user_no}
update users set pw = #{pw} where user_no = #{user_no}
